Statements.Statement: ,`exp`.CompanyCode ,ifnull(`exp`.DelYn,'N') AS DelYn ,`exp`.`CreateId` ,date_format(`exp`.CreateDt, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS `CreateDt` ,`exp`.`UpdateId` ,date_format(`exp`.UpdateDt, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS `UpdateDt` ,`exp`.`DeleteId` ,date_format(`exp`.DeleteDt, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS `DeleteDt`

SELECT `exp`.`InvoiceNo`, `exp`.`InvoiceDate`, `exp`.`ShipperCode`, `shp`.`CustName` AS `ShipperName`, `exp`.`ShipperAddress`, `exp`.`ConsigneeCode`, `csn`.`CustName` AS `ConsigneeName`, `exp`.`ConsigneeAddress`, `exp`.`NotifyCode`, `nty`.`CustName` AS `NotifyName`, `exp`.`NotifyAddress`, `exp`.`BuyerCode`, `byr`.`CustName` AS `BuyerName`, `exp`.`BuyerAddress`, `exp`.`DepartureDate`, `exp`.`CarrierName`, `exp`.`PolCode`, `exp`.`PodCode`, `exp`.`DeliveryTermCode`, `exp`.`DestinationName`, `exp`.`PaymentTermCode`, `exp`.`PaymentDesc`, format(`exp`.`Measurement`, 3) as Measurement, format(`exp`.`NetWeight`,2) as NetWeight, format(`exp`.`GrossWeight`,2) as GrossWeight, `exp`.`ShippingMark`, `exp`.`Remark`, `exp`.`PackingRemark`, `exp`.`InvoiceRemark`
FROM `tb_export_master` exp LEFT JOIN `soodal`.`tb_customer` shp ON shp.CustCode = exp.ShipperCode AND shp.CompanyCode = exp.CompanyCode LEFT JOIN `soodal`.`tb_customer` csn ON csn.CustCode = exp.ConsigneeCode AND csn.CompanyCode = exp.CompanyCode LEFT JOIN `soodal`.`tb_customer` nty ON nty.CustCode = exp.NotifyCode AND nty.CompanyCode = exp.CompanyCode LEFT JOIN `soodal`.`tb_customer` byr ON byr.CustCode = exp.BuyerCode AND byr.CompanyCode = exp.CompanyCode WHERE `exp`.`CompanyCode` = @CompanyCode AND `exp`.`DelYn` != 'Y'
`exp`.`InvoiceDate` BETWEEN @PeriodFromDt AND @PeriodToDt
`exp`.`InvoiceNo` Like Concat("%",@InvoiceNo "%")
`exp`.`BuyerCode` = @BuyerCode

SELECT `exp`.`InvoiceNo`, `exp`.`InvoiceDate`, `exp`.`ShipperCode`, `shp`.`CustName` AS `ShipperName`, `exp`.`ShipperAddress`, `exp`.`ConsigneeCode`, `csn`.`CustName` AS `ConsigneeName`, `exp`.`ConsigneeAddress`, `exp`.`NotifyCode`, `nty`.`CustName` AS `NotifyName`, `exp`.`NotifyAddress`, `exp`.`BuyerCode`, `byr`.`CustName` AS `BuyerName`, `exp`.`BuyerAddress`, `exp`.`DepartureDate`, `exp`.`CarrierName`, `exp`.`PolCode`, `exp`.`PodCode`, `exp`.`DeliveryTermCode`, `exp`.`DestinationName`, `exp`.`PaymentTermCode`, `exp`.`PaymentDesc`, format(`exp`.`Measurement`, 3) as Measurement, format(`exp`.`NetWeight`,2) as NetWeight, format(`exp`.`GrossWeight`,2) as GrossWeight, `exp`.`ShippingMark`, `exp`.`Remark`, `exp`.`PackingRemark`, `exp`.`InvoiceRemark`
FROM `tb_export_master` exp LEFT JOIN `soodal`.`tb_customer` shp ON shp.CustCode = exp.ShipperCode AND shp.CompanyCode = exp.CompanyCode LEFT JOIN `soodal`.`tb_customer` csn ON csn.CustCode = exp.ConsigneeCode AND csn.CompanyCode = exp.CompanyCode LEFT JOIN `soodal`.`tb_customer` nty ON nty.CustCode = exp.NotifyCode AND nty.CompanyCode = exp.CompanyCode LEFT JOIN `soodal`.`tb_customer` byr ON byr.CustCode = exp.BuyerCode AND byr.CompanyCode = exp.CompanyCode WHERE `exp`.`InvoiceNo` = @InvoiceNo AND `exp`.`CompanyCode` = @CompanyCode AND `exp`.`DelYn` != 'Y' LIMIT 1

UPDATE `tb_export_master` SET `InvoiceDate` = @InvoiceDate, `ShipperCode` = @ShipperCode, `ShipperAddress` = @ShipperAddress, `ConsigneeCode` = @ConsigneeCode, `ConsigneeAddress` = @ConsigneeAddress, `NotifyCode` = @NotifyCode, `NotifyAddress` = @NotifyAddress, `BuyerCode` = @BuyerCode, `BuyerAddress` = @BuyerAddress, `DepartureDate` = @DepartureDate, `CarrierName` = @CarrierName, `PolCode` = @PolCode, `PodCode` = @PodCode, `DeliveryTermCode` = @DeliveryTermCode, `DestinationName` = @DestinationName, `PaymentTermCode` = @PaymentTermCode, `PaymentDesc` = @PaymentDesc, `Measurement` = @Measurement, `NetWeight` = @NetWeight, `GrossWeight` = @GrossWeight, `ShippingMark` = @ShippingMark, `Remark` = @Remark, `PackingRemark` = @PackingRemark, `InvoiceRemark` = @InvoiceRemark, `DelYn` = 'N', `UpdateId` = @UpdateId, `UpdateDt` = now(), `DeleteId` = null, `DeleteDt` = null WHERE `InvoiceNo` = @InvoiceNo AND `CompanyCode` = @CompanyCode
UPDATE `tb_export_master` SET `DelYn` = 'Y', `DeleteId` = @DeleteId, `DeleteDt` = now() WHERE `InvoiceNo` = @InvoiceNo AND `CompanyCode` = @CompanyCode

SELECT `cntr`.`InvoiceNo`, `cntr`.`ContainerId`, `cntr`.`ContainerSeq`, `cntr`.`ContainerNo`, `cntr`.`SealNo1`, `cntr`.`SealNo2`, `cntr`.`SealNo3` FROM `tb_export_container` cntr WHERE `InvoiceNo` = @InvoiceNo AND `CompanyCode` = @CompanyCode AND `DelYn` != 'Y' ORDER BY ContainerSeq

SELECT `cntr`.`InvoiceNo`, `cntr`.`ContainerId`, `cntr`.`ContainerSeq`, `cntr`.`ContainerNo`, `cntr`.`SealNo1`, `cntr`.`SealNo2`, `cntr`.`SealNo3` FROM `tb_export_container` cntr WHERE `InvoiceNo` = @InvoiceNo AND `ContainerId` = @ContainerId AND `CompanyCode` = @CompanyCode AND `DelYn` != 'Y' LIMIT 1
UPDATE `tb_export_container` SET `DelYn` = 'Y', `DeleteId` = @DeleteId, `DeleteDt` = now() WHERE `InvoiceNo` = @InvoiceNo AND `ContainerId` = @ContainerId AND `CompanyCode` = @CompanyCode

SELECT `pack`.`InvoiceNo`, `pack`.`PackingId`, `pack`.`PackingSeq`, `pack`.`OrderNo`, `pack`.`OrderDetailId`, `ord`.`BuyerPoNo`, `pack`.`PkgUnitCode`, `pack`.`PkgStartNo`, `pack`.`PkgEndNo`, TRIM(TRAILING '.' FROM TRIM(TRAILING '0' FROM FORMAT( `pack`.`Qty`, 2))) as Qty, TRIM(TRAILING '.' FROM TRIM(TRAILING '0' FROM FORMAT(`pack`.`PkgQty`, 2))) as PkgQty, `pack`.`CompanyCode`, `pack`.`DelYn`, `pack`.`CreateId`, it.Size as `ItemSize`, it.Size as `ItemNo`, date_format(`pack`.`CreateDt`, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS `CreateDt`, `pack`.`UpdateId`, date_format(`pack`.`UpdateDt`, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS `UpdateDt`, `pack`.`DeleteId`, date_format(`pack`.`DeleteDt`, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS `DeleteDt` FROM `tb_export_packing` pack JOIN `soodal`.`tb_po_master` `ord` ON `ord`.`OrderNo` = `pack`.`OrderNo` join tb_po_detail pod on pod.OrderNo = pack.OrderNo and pod.DetailId = pack.OrderDetailId join tb_item it on it.GroupCode = pod.ItemGroupCode and it.`ItemCode` = pod.`ItemCode` WHERE `pack`.`InvoiceNo` = @InvoiceNo AND `pack`.`CompanyCode` = @CompanyCode AND `pack`.`DelYn` != 'Y' ORDER BY PackingSeq

SELECT `pack`.`InvoiceNo`, `pack`.`PackingId`, `pack`.`PackingSeq`, `pack`.`OrderNo`, `pack`.`OrderDetailId`, `ord`.`BuyerPoNo`, `pack`.`PkgUnitCode`, `pack`.`PkgStartNo`, `pack`.`PkgEndNo`, TRIM(TRAILING '.' FROM TRIM(TRAILING '0' FROM FORMAT( `pack`.`Qty`, 2))) as Qty, `pack`.`PkgQty`, `pack`.`CompanyCode`, `pack`.`DelYn`, `pack`.`CreateId`, date_format(`pack`.`CreateDt`, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS `CreateDt`, `pack`.`UpdateId`, date_format(`pack`.`UpdateDt`, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS `UpdateDt`, `pack`.`DeleteId`, date_format(`pack`.`DeleteDt`, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS `DeleteDt` FROM `tb_export_packing` `pack` LEFT JOIN `soodal`.`tb_po_master` `ord` ON `ord`.`OrderNo` = `pack`.`OrderNo` WHERE `pack`.`InvoiceNo` = @InvoiceNo AND `pack`.`PackingId` = @PackingId AND `pack`.`CompanyCode` = @CompanyCode AND `pack`.`DelYn` != 'Y' LIMIT 1

INSERT INTO `tb_export_packing` ( `InvoiceNo`, `PackingId`, `PackingSeq`, `OrderNo`, `OrderDetailId`, `PkgUnitCode`, `PkgStartNo`, `PkgEndNo`, `Qty`, `PkgQty`, `CompanyCode`, `DelYn`, `CreateId`, `CreateDt` ) VALUES ( @InvoiceNo, `soodal`.`FN_CreateExpPkgId`(@CompanyCode, @InvoiceNo, @PackingId), @PackingSeq, @OrderNo, @OrderDetailId, @PkgUnitCode, @PkgStartNo, @PkgEndNo, @Qty, @PkgQty, @CompanyCode, 'N', @CreateId, NOW() ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE `OrderNo` = VALUES(`OrderNo`), `OrderDetailId` = VALUES(`OrderDetailId`), `PackingId` = VALUES(`PackingId`), `PackingSeq` = VALUES(`PackingSeq`), `PkgUnitCode` = VALUES(`PkgUnitCode`), `PkgStartNo` = VALUES(`PkgStartNo`), `PkgEndNo` = VALUES(`PkgEndNo`), `Qty` = VALUES(`Qty`), `PkgQty` = VALUES(`PkgQty`), `DelYn` = 'N', `UpdateId` = @UpdateId, `UpdateDt` = NOW(), `DeleteId` = NULL, `DeleteDt` = NULL
UPDATE `tb_export_packing` SET `DelYn` = 'Y', `DeleteId` = @DeleteId, `DeleteDt` = now() WHERE `InvoiceNo` = @InvoiceNo AND `PackingId` = @PackingId AND `CompanyCode` = @CompanyCode

SELECT `inv`.`InvoiceNo`, `inv`.`InvoiceId`, `inv`.`InvoiceSeq`, `inv`.`OrderNo`, `inv`.`OrderDetailId`, `inv`.`ItemLength`, `inv`.`UsQty`, `inv`.`Qty`, `inv`.`UnitPrice`, `inv`.`Amount`, `inv`.`CompanyCode`, `inv`.`DelYn`, `inv`.`CreateId`, it.ItemNo, it.Size as ItemSize, date_format(`inv`.`CreateDt`, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS `CreateDt`, `inv`.`UpdateId`, date_format(`inv`.`UpdateDt`, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS `UpdateDt`, `inv`.`DeleteId`, date_format(`inv`.`DeleteDt`, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS `DeleteDt`, `ord`.`BuyerPoNo` FROM `tb_export_invoice` inv JOIN `soodal`.`tb_po_master` ord ON `ord`.`OrderNo` = `inv`.`OrderNo` join tb_po_detail pod on pod.OrderNo = inv.OrderNo and pod.DetailId = inv.OrderDetailId join tb_item it on it.GroupCode = pod.ItemGroupCode and it.ItemCode = pod.ItemCode WHERE `inv`.`CompanyCode` = @CompanyCode AND `inv`.`InvoiceNo` = @InvoiceNo AND `inv`.`DelYn` != 'Y' ORDER BY `inv`.`InvoiceSeq`

SELECT `inv`.`InvoiceNo`, `inv`.`InvoiceId`, `inv`.`InvoiceSeq`, `inv`.`OrderNo`, `inv`.`OrderDetailId`, `inv`.`ItemLength`, `inv`.`UsQty`, `inv`.`Qty`, `inv`.`UnitPrice`, `inv`.`Amount`, `inv`.`CompanyCode`, `inv`.`DelYn`, `inv`.`CreateId`, date_format(`inv`.`CreateDt`, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS `CreateDt`, `inv`.`UpdateId`, date_format(`inv`.`UpdateDt`, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS `UpdateDt`, `inv`.`DeleteId`, date_format(`inv`.`DeleteDt`, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS `DeleteDt`, `ord`.`BuyerPoNo` FROM `tb_export_invoice` inv JOIN `soodal`.`tb_po_master` ord ON `ord`.`OrderNo` = `inv`.`OrderNo` WHERE `InvoiceNo` = @InvoiceNo AND `InvoiceId` = @InvoiceId AND `CompanyCode` = @CompanyCode AND `DelYn` != 'Y' LIMIT 1
UPDATE `tb_export_invoice` SET `DelYn` = 'Y', `DeleteId` = @DeleteId, `DeleteDt` = now() WHERE `InvoiceNo` = @InvoiceNo AND `InvoiceId` = @InvoiceId AND `CompanyCode` = @CompanyCode

select mst.InvoiceNo , mst.InvoiceDate , mst.ShipperCode , shp.CustName as ShipperName , mst.ShipperAddress , mst.ConsigneeCode , csn.CustName as ConsigneeName , mst.ConsigneeAddress , mst.NotifyCode , nty.CustName as NotifyName , mst.NotifyAddress , mst.BuyerCode , byr.CustName as BuyerName , mst.BuyerAddress , mst.DepartureDate , mst.CarrierName , mst.PolCode , pol.PortName as PolName , mst.DestinationName , mst.PodCode , pod.PortName as PodName , mst.DeliveryTermCode , del.`Name` as DeliveryTermName , mst.PaymentTermCode , pay.`Name` as PaymentTermName , mst.PaymentDesc , format(mst.Measurement, 3) as Measurement , format(mst.NetWeight,2) as NetWeight , format(mst.GrossWeight,2) as GrossWeight , mst.ShippingMark , mst.Remark , mst.PackingRemark , mst.InvoiceRemark from tb_export_master mst left join tb_customer shp on mst.ShipperCode = shp.CustCode left join tb_customer csn on mst.ConsigneeCode = csn.CustCode left join tb_customer nty on mst.NotifyCode = nty.CustCode left join tb_customer byr on mst.BuyerCode = byr.CustCode left join tb_shipport_code pol on mst.PolCode = pol.PortCode left join tb_shipport_code pod on mst.PodCode = pod.PortCode left join tb_code_detail del on mst.DeliveryTermCode = del.`Code` and del.MasterCode = 'DELIVERYTERMS' left join tb_code_detail pay on mst.PaymentTermCode = pay.`Code` and pay.MasterCode = 'PAYMENTTERMS' where mst.InvoiceNo = @InvoiceNo

select pkg.InvoiceNo , GROUP_CONCAT(distinct(pom.BuyerPoNo) separator ',') as BuyerPoNo , GROUP_CONCAT(distinct(pom.OrderDt) separator ',') as BuyerPoDate from tb_export_packing pkg join tb_po_master pom on pkg.OrderNo = pom.OrderNo where pkg.InvoiceNo = @InvoiceNo

select InvoiceNo as InvoiceNo , GROUP_CONCAT(CONCAT(ContainerNo, '/' , CONCAT_WS(',' , IF(SealNo1 <> '', SealNo1, null) , IF(SealNo2 <> '', SealNo2, null) , IF(SealNo3 <> '', SealNo3, null))) SEPARATOR '\r\n') as ContainerNo from tb_export_container cntr where InvoiceNo = @InvoiceNO group by InvoiceNo order by InvoiceNo, ContainerNo

select mst.InvoiceNo as InvoiceNo , itg.GroupName as ItemGroupName , itg.AliasName as ItemGroupNameAlias , pkg.PkgUnitCode , pkgc.`Option1` as PkgUnitName , pkg.PkgStartNo , pkg.PkgEndNo , pod.SizeName , (pkg.Qty * pkg.PkgQty) as TotQty , unic.`Option1` as PcsUnitName , pkg.Qty as PcsQty , pkg.PkgQty as PkgQty from tb_export_master mst join tb_export_packing pkg on mst.InvoiceNo = pkg.InvoiceNo join tb_po_detail pod on pod.OrderNo = pkg.OrderNo and pod.DetailId = pkg.OrderDetailId left join tb_item it on it.GroupCode = pod.ItemGroupCode and it.ItemCode = pod.ItemCode left join tb_item_group itg on it.GroupCode = itg.GroupCode left join tb_code_detail pkgc on pkgc.MasterCode = 'PACKINGUNIT' and pkgc.`Code` = pkg.PkgUnitCode join tb_code_detail unic on unic.MasterCode = 'ITEMUNIT' and unic.`Code` = pod.UnitCode where mst.InvoiceNo = @InvoiceNo order by PackingSeq

select mt.InvoiceNo , iv.InvoiceId , iv.InvoiceSeq , iv.OrderNo , iv.OrderDetailId , pd.ItemGroupCode , ig.GroupName as ItemGroupName , ig.AliasName as ItemGroupAliasName , pd.ItemCode , it.ItemName , it.AliasName as ItemAliasName , it.Size as ItemSize , it.`Description` as ItemLength , iv.UsQty , iv.Qty , iv.UnitPrice , iv.Amount , iv.CompanyCode from tb_export_master mt left join tb_export_invoice iv on mt.InvoiceNo = iv.InvoiceNo left join tb_po_detail pd on pd.OrderNo = iv.OrderNo and pd.DetailId = iv.OrderDetailId left join tb_item it on it.GroupCode = pd.ItemGroupCode and it.ItemCode = pd.ItemCode left join tb_item_group ig on ig.GroupCode = it.GroupCode where mt.InvoiceNo = @InvoiceNo order by iv.InvoiceId
